property.name: MemberName
property.description: Name of the member to which this widget is bound.

property.name: Tooltip
property.label: Tooltip
property.description: Tooltip for this widget

command.name: InsertBefore
command.label: Insert Before
command.description: Insert an empty row/column before the selected one

command.name: InsertAfter
command.label: Insert After
command.description: Insert an empty row/column after the selected one

property.name: AutoSize
property.label: Auto Size
property.description: If set, the other packing properties for this cell will be automatically adjusted as other widgets are added to and removed from the container

property.name: Size
property.label: Size
property.description: The number of buttons

command.name: InsertBefore
command.label: Insert Button Before
command.description: Insert a new button before the selected one

command.name: InsertAfter
command.label: Insert Button After
command.description: Insert a new button after the selected one

property.name: Type
property.label: Button Type
property.description: The type of button

property.name: StockId
property.label: Stock Item
property.description: The stock button ID

property.name: Icon
property.label: Icon
property.description: The icon to display in the button

property.name: ResponseId
property.label: Response Id
property.description: The response ID to emit when this button is clicked.

property.name: Label
property.label: Label
property.description: The text of the menu item

property.name: UseUnderline
property.label: Use Underline
property.description: If set, an underline in the text indicates the next character should be used for the mnemonic accelerator key

property.name: IsTextCombo
property.label: Text ComboBox
property.description: Checked if the combo box displays a list of strings

property.name: Items
property.label: Items
property.description: The items to display in the Combo Box, one per line

property.name: Buttons
property.label: Number of Buttons
property.description: The number of buttons

property.name: HelpButton
property.label: Help Button
property.description: Whether or not to display a 'Help' button

command.name: InsertBefore
command.label: Insert Page Before
command.description: Insert a blank page before this one

command.name: InsertAfter
command.label: Insert Page After
command.description: Insert a blank page after this one

command.name: SwapPrevious
command.label: Swap with Previous Page
command.description: Swap the contents of this page with the contents of the previous page

command.name: SwapNext
command.label: Swap with Next Page
command.description: Swap the contents of this page with the contents of the next page

property.name: Active
property.label: Active
property.description: The active menu item

property.name: Group
property.label: Group
property.description: The name of the radio button group that this button belongs to

command.name: InsertRowBefore
command.label: Insert Row Before
command.description: Insert an empty row above the selected row

command.name: InsertRowAfter
command.label: Insert Row After
command.description: Insert an empty row below the selected row

command.name: InsertColumnBefore
command.label: Insert Column Before
command.description: Insert an empty column before the selected column

command.name: InsertColumnAfter
command.label: Insert Column After
command.description: Insert an empty column after the selected column

property.name: AutoSize
property.label: Auto Size
property.description: If set, the other packing properties for this cell will be automatically adjusted as other widgets are added to and removed from the container

property.name: XExpand
property.label: Expand Horizontally
property.description: Whether or not the table cell should expand horizontally

property.name: XFill
property.label: Fill Horizontally
property.description: Whether or not the widget should expand to fill its cell horizontally

property.name: XShrink
property.label: Shrink Horizontally
property.description: Whether or not the table cell should shrink horizontally

property.name: YExpand
property.label: Expand Vertically
property.description: Whether or not the table cell should expand vertically

property.name: YFill
property.label: Fill Vertically
property.description: Whether or not the widget should expand to fill its cell vertically

property.name: YShrink
property.label: Shrink Vertically
property.description: Whether or not the table cell should shrink vertically

property.name: Text
property.label: Text
property.description: The initial text to display in the Text View

property.name: Group
property.label: Group
property.description: The name of the radio action group that this action belongs to

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: No extension events are desired

value.name: All
value.label: All
value.description: All extension events are desired

value.name: Cursor
value.label: Only if cursor displayed
value.description: Extension events are desired only if a cursor will be displayed for the device

value.name: ExposureMask
value.label: Expose
value.description: Receive expose events

value.name: PointerMotionMask
value.label: All pointer motion
value.description: Receive all pointer motion events

value.name: PointerMotionHintMask
value.label: Requested pointer motion
value.description: Receive pointer motion events when requested

value.name: ButtonMotionMask
value.label: Pointer motion w/ any button
value.description: Receive pointer motion events while any button is pressed

value.name: Button1MotionMask
value.label: Pointer motion w/ button 1
value.description: Receive pointer motion events while button 1 is pressed

value.name: Button2MotionMask
value.label: Pointer motion w/ button 2
value.description: Receive pointer motion events while button 2 is pressed

value.name: Button3MotionMask
value.label: Pointer motion w/ button 3
value.description: Receive pointer motion events while button 3 is pressed

value.name: ButtonPressMask
value.label: Button press
value.description: Receive button press events

value.name: ButtonReleaseMask
value.label: Button release
value.description: Receive button release events

value.name: KeyPressMask
value.label: Key press
value.description: Receive key press events

value.name: KeyReleaseMask
value.label: Key release
value.description: Receive key release events

value.name: EnterNotifyMask
value.label: Window enter
value.description: Receive window enter events

value.name: LeaveNotifyMask
value.label: Window leave
value.description: Receive window leave events

value.name: FocusChangeMask
value.label: Focus change
value.description: Receive focus change events

value.name: StructureMask
value.label: Window structure change
value.description: Receive events about window configuration change

value.name: PropertyChangeMask
value.label: Property change
value.description: Receive property change events

value.name: VisibilityNotifyMask
value.label: Visibility change
value.description: Receive visibility change events

value.name: ProximityInMask
value.label: Proximity in
value.description: Receive proximity in events

value.name: ProximityOutMask
value.label: Proximity out
value.description: Receive proximity out events

value.name: SubstructureMask
value.label: Window substructure change
value.description: Receive events about window configuration changes of child windows

value.name: ScrollMask
value.label: Scroll
value.description: Receive scroll events

value.name: NorthWest
value.label: Northwest
value.description: The reference point is at the top left corner

value.name: North
value.label: North
value.description: The reference point is at the middle of the top edge

value.name: NorthEast
value.label: Northeast
value.description: The reference point is at the top right corner

value.name: West
value.label: West
value.description: The reference point is at the middle of the left edge

value.name: Center
value.label: Center
value.description: The reference point is at the center of the window

value.name: East
value.label: East
value.description: The reference point is at the middle of the right edge

value.name: SouthWest
value.label: Southwest
value.description: The reference point is at the lower left corner

value.name: South
value.label: South
value.description: The reference point is at the middle of the lower edge

value.name: SouthEast
value.label: Southeast
value.description: The reference point is at the lower right corner

value.name: Static
value.label: Static
value.description: The reference point is at the top left corner of the window itself, ignoring window manager decorations

value.name: Normal
value.label: Normal
value.description: Normal toplevel window

value.name: Dialog
value.label: Dialog
value.description: Dialog window

value.name: Menu
value.label: Menu
value.description: Window used to implement a menu

value.name: Toolbar
value.label: Toolbar
value.description: Window used to implement a toolbar

value.name: Splashscreen
value.label: Splash screen
value.description: Window used to display a splash screen

value.name: Utility
value.label: Utility
value.description: Utility windows which are not detached toolbars or dialogs

value.name: Dock
value.label: Dock
value.description: Used for creating dock or panel windows

value.name: Desktop
value.label: Desktop
value.description: Used for creating the desktop background window

value.name: Expand
value.label: Expand
value.description: The widget should expand to take up any extra space in its container that has been allocated

value.name: Shrink
value.label: Shrink
value.description: The widget should shrink as and when possible

value.name: Fill
value.label: Fill
value.description: The widget should fill the space allocated to it

value.name: DefaultStyle
value.label: Default
value.description: Default packing

value.name: Spread
value.label: Spread
value.description: Buttons are evenly spread across the ButtonBox

value.name: Edge
value.label: Edge
value.description: Buttons are placed at the edges of the ButtonBox

value.name: Start
value.label: Start
value.description: Buttons are grouped towards the start (left or top) of the box

value.name: End
value.label: End
value.description: Buttons are grouped toward the end (right or bottom) of the box

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: No buttons at all

value.name: Ok
value.label: OK
value.description: an OK button

value.name: Close
value.label: Close
value.description: a Close button

value.name: Cancel
value.label: Cancel
value.description: a Cancel button

value.name: YesNo
value.label: Yes / No
value.description: Yes and No buttons

value.name: OkCancel
value.label: OK / Cancel
value.description: OK and Cancel buttons

value.name: TopLeft
value.label: Top Left
value.description: Place the scrollbars on the right and bottom of the contents

value.name: BottomLeft
value.label: Bottom Left
value.description: Place the scrollbrs on the top and right of the contents

value.name: TopRight
value.label: Top Right
value.description: Place the scrollbrs on the left and bottom of the contents

value.name: BottomRight
value.label: Bottom Right
value.description: Place the scrollbrs on the top and left of the contents

value.name: Open
value.label: Open
value.description: Open mode. The file chooser will only let the user pick an existing file.

value.name: Save
value.label: Save
value.description: Save mode. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing file, or type in a new filename.

value.name: SelectFolder
value.label: Select Folder
value.description: Open mode for selecting folders. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing folder.

value.name: CreateFolder
value.label: Create Folder
value.description: Mode for creating a new folder. The file chooser will let the user name an existing or new folder.

value.name: Menu
value.label: Menu
value.description: The size of an icon an a menu item

value.name: SmallToolbar
value.label: Small Toolbar
value.description: The size of an icon in a small toolbar

value.name: LargeToolbar
value.label: Large Toolbar
value.description: The size of an icon in a large toolbar

value.name: Button
value.label: Button
value.description: The size of an icon in a button

value.name: Dnd
value.label: Drag and Drop
value.description: The size of an icon in a drag-and-drop operation

value.name: Dialog
value.label: Dialog
value.description: The size of an icon in a dialog box

value.name: Left
value.label: Left
value.description: The text is placed at the left edge of the label

value.name: Right
value.label: Right
value.description: The text is placed at the right edge of the label

value.name: Center
value.label: Center
value.description: The text is placed in the center of the label

value.name: Fill
value.label: Fill
value.description: The text is distributed across the label

value.name: Info
value.label: Info
value.description: Informational message

value.name: Warning
value.label: Warning
value.description: Non-fatal warning message

value.name: Question
value.label: Question
value.description: Question requiring a choice

value.name: Error
value.label: Error
value.description: Fatal error message

value.name: Horizontal
value.label: Horizontal
value.description: The widget is in horizontal orientation

value.name: Vertical
value.label: Vertical
value.description: The widget is in vertical orientation

value.name: Start
value.label: Start
value.description: The child is packed into the start (left or top) of the box

value.name: End
value.label: End
value.description: The child is packed into the end (right or bottom) of the box

value.name: Always
value.label: Always
value.description: The scrollbar is always visible

value.name: Automatic
value.label: Automatic
value.description: The scrollbar will appear and disappear as necessary

value.name: Never
value.label: Never
value.description: The scrollbar will never appear

value.name: Left
value.label: Left
value.description: The feature is at the left edge

value.name: Right
value.label: Right
value.description: The feature is at the right edge

value.name: Top
value.label: Top
value.description: The feature is at the top edge

value.name: Bottom
value.label: Bottom
value.description: The feature is at the bottom edge

value.name: LeftToRight
value.label: Left to right
value.description: A horizontal progress bar growing from left to right

value.name: RightToLeft
value.label: Right to left
value.description: A horizontal progress bar growing from right to left

value.name: BottomToTop
value.label: Bottom to top
value.description: A vertical progress bar growing from bottom to top

value.name: TopToBottom
value.label: Top to bottom
value.description: A vertical progress bar growing from top to bottom

value.name: Normal
value.label: Normal
value.description: Draw a normal relief around the button

value.name: Half
value.label: Half
value.description: Draw a half relief around the button

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: Draw no relief around the button

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: No outline

value.name: In
value.label: In
value.description: The outline is bevelled inwards

value.name: Out
value.label: Out
value.description: The outline is bevelled outwards, like a button

value.name: Always
value.label: Always
value.description: When refreshing the SpinButton, the value is always displayed

value.name: IfValid
value.label: If valid
value.description: When refreshing the SpinButton, the value is only displayed if it is within the SpinButton's bounds

value.name: Default
value.label: System Default
value.description: Use the system default style

value.name: Icons
value.label: Icons
value.description: Buttons display only icons in the toolbar

value.name: Text
value.label: Text
value.description: Buttons display only text labels in the toolbar

value.name: Both
value.label: Both
value.description: Buttons display text and icons in the toolbar

value.name: BothHoriz
value.label: Both horizontally
value.description: Buttons display icons and text alongside each other, rather than vertically stacked

value.name: Continuous
value.label: Continuous
value.description: The range value will change continuously as the slider is moved

value.name: Discontinuous
value.label: Discontinuous
value.description: The range value will change only after the user releases the mouse button

value.name: Delayed
value.label: Delayed
value.description: The range value will change if the user stops sliding the slider for a moment

value.name: None
value.label: Not specified
value.description: The window can be placed wherever the window manager chooses

value.name: Center
value.label: Centered
value.description: The window should be placed in the center of the screen

value.name: Mouse
value.label: At mouse position
value.description: The window should be placed at the current mouse position

value.name: CenterAlways
value.label: Always centered
value.description: The window should be kept centered even if it changes size

value.name: CenterOnParent
value.label: Centered on parent
value.description: Center the window on the parent window that it is transient for

value.name: Toplevel
value.label: Toplevel
value.description: A regular window or dialog

value.name: Popup
value.label: Popup
value.description: A special window such as a tooltip

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: Do not wrap lines; just make the text area wider

value.name: Char
value.label: Character
value.description: Wrap text, breaking lines between any characters

value.name: Word
value.label: Word
value.description: Wrap text, breaking lines between words

value.name: WordChar
value.label: Word or Character
value.description: Wrap text, preferably breaking lines between words, but also breaking between characters if needed

value.name: StockItem
value.label: Stock button
value.description: Button displaying stock icon and text

value.name: TextOnly
value.label: Text only
value.description: Button displaying text only

value.name: TextAndIcon
value.label: Text and Icon
value.description: Button displaying an icon and application-provided text

value.name: Custom
value.label: Custom
value.description: Button with entirely custom contents

value.name: StockItem
value.label: Stock button
value.description: Button displaying stock icon and text

value.name: TextAndIcon
value.label: Text and Icon
value.description: Button displaying an icon and application-provided text

value.name: Action
value.label: Action
value.description: An normal action

value.name: Toggle
value.label: Toggle Action
value.description: The action can be toggled between two states

value.name: Radio
value.label: Radio Action
value.description: The action is controlled by a radio button

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: No ellipsization

value.name: Start
value.label: Start
value.description: Omit characters at the start of the text

value.name: Middle
value.label: Middle
value.description: Omit characters in the middle of the text

value.name: End
value.label: End
value.description: Omit characters at the end of the text

value.name: None
value.label: None
value.description: Nothing can be selected

value.name: Single
value.label: Single
value.description: Only one item can be selected at any given moment. Other items can have focus, but will not be marked as selected

value.name: Browse
value.label: Browse
value.description: Only one item can be selected at any given moment. Any item currently having focus will be marked as selected

value.name: Multiple
value.label: Multiple
value.description: Several items may be selected or unselected with a click or using the spacebar. The selection can be done using the Ctrl and Shift modifier keys in the usual way

value.name: Ttb
value.label: Top to bottom
value.description: Top to bottom

value.name: Btt
value.label: Bottom to top
value.description: Bottom to top

value.name: Rtl
value.label: Right to left
value.description: Right to left

value.name: Ltr
value.label: Left to right
value.description: Left to right
